traits.name: Relentless
entries: When Nauk is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead. He can't use this feature again for 24 hours

traits.name: Potion Mishap
entries: When Nauk uses the Imbibe Potion action more than once in an hour, roll {@dice 1d4} for what happens:

items: 2. The potion works normally. In addition, Nauk turns {@condition invisible} for 1 minute or until Nauk attacks or casts a spell.
4. Instead of the normal effect, the potion causes fire to explode out of Nauk's mouth in a 15 ft. cone. Nauk and any creature in the cone take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage.

traits.name: Special Items
entries: Nauk wears {@item adamantine plate armor}. He wields a {@item +1 maul} and a {@item +1 heavy crossbow||heavy crossbow +1} which is already factored into his stats. He has 2 {@item potion of cold resistance||potions of resistanceâ€”cold}, 2 {@item potion of fire resistance||potions of resistanceâ€”fire}, 2 {@item potion of lightning resistance||potions of resistanceâ€”lightning}. He has 2 {@item potion of heroism||potions of heroism} and 4 {@item potion of superior healing||potions of superior healing}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Nauk makes three melee attacks. Nauk may substitute one of those attacks for the Imbibe Potion action.

actions.name: Maul, +1
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow, +1
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, ranged 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Imbibe Potion
entries: Nauk drinks a potion from the following list:

items: Potion of heroism: Nauk gains 10 temporary hit points for 1 hour. For the same duration, Nauk is under the effect of the {@spell bless} spell (no {@status concentration} required).
Potion of resistance: Nauk gains resistance from one damage type for 1 hour. Nauk chooses from one of these damage types: cold, fire, lightning.
Potion of superior healing: Nauk regains 28 hit points.
